article_title: Pakistan Attacks Taliban Hide-Outs After Militants Again Hit Karachi
article_text:
ISLAMABAD, Pakistan—Pakistan launched airstrikes on Tuesday against hide-outs of militants in the tribal areas, as security forces repelled a fresh attack near Karachi's airport, two days after the Taliban's assault on the country's busiest air hub.

Nuclear-armed Pakistan has retaliated against Taliban attacks with periodic airstrikes in recent months.

But, after Sunday's spectacular assault on Jinnah International Airport,...
